metadata.description: Caption title. In this edition, "Sur l'assassinat de Collot-d'Herbois" is set in italic type; it is set in Roman type in some other editions
At head of title: Convention nationale
Imprint from colophon. In this edition, place of publication is absent; other editions of the same work list Paris as the place of publication
metadata.notes: Title page located on cover page. No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Worn, damaged cover and pages. Skewed text.
